sourcesContent:
import React, {Fragment} from 'react' import styles from './Meals.module.css' import Card from '../UI/Card' const MealItem = () =>{ const allMeals = [ { id: 'meal1', name: 'Pizza', description: 'the perfect italian way', price: '14.99' }, { id: 'meal2', name: 'Bibimbap', description: 'the taste of korea', price: '13.99' }, { id: 'meal3', name: 'Tacos', description: 'awesome mexican food', price: '12.99' } ] console.log(allMeals) let idx = allMeals.length; console.log(idx) const prices = allMeals.map((x) => x[0].price) console.log(prices) console.log(allMeals.price) return (
    {allMeals.map(meal => (

  • {meal.name}

    {meal.description}

    {meal.price}

    FOTO

    • ))}
) } export default MealItem;
